scripts.fix:bug: cd ../exercises/part2/phonebook && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf package-lock.json && npm cache clean --force && npm install
scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../exercises/part2/phonebook && npm run build && cp -r build ..../parts3
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push && npm run deploy
